note.p: Birth: Near Tapanui, New Zealand (27 August 1892)
Education: Tapanui High School; Victoria University College of Wellington
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1964 vol 10 pp 15-37, plate, by J Ramsbottom
References: Robin J H Clark and Michael J Kelly, 'New Zealand, New Zealanders and the Royal Society' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 263-281
